summary: Interactive gallery app with user-uploaded images and videos displayed together in a single mixed gallery feed.

existing_features.title: Update the Gallery page UI to allow signed-in users to upload images and videos, and display uploaded items mixed together with the existing gallery content in the same grid.
Extend the gallery lightbox/viewer experience to support both images and videos (in addition to existing image viewing), including keyboard navigation and accessible controls.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add user uploads for images and videos, displayed mixed together in the existing gallery.
Add backend support for storing and listing user-uploaded Gallery media items (images and videos), so uploaded items can be fetched by the frontend and displayed mixed together in the /gallery feed.

projectName: Add user uploads for images and videos to the Gallery (mixed feed)
